content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=10 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=11 y=11.
Please fix your order.

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (11, 11) while at (26, 23).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (26, 23), outbound toward (11, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (15, 5) while at (26, 23).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (24, 19), outbound toward (11, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (26, 23), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "両航空隊(BSQ1とBSQ2)が異なる方向に索敵中。現状分析:
1. BSQ1は(11, 11)方向、BSQ2は(15, 5)方向へ飛行
2. 敵空母の位置はまだ不明
3. 索敵範囲を広げることで、敵空母発見の可能性を高めている

次のターンの戦略:
- 現在の両航空隊の飛行経路を維持
- 空母BC1は現在位置で静止し、航空隊の索敵結果を待つ
- 早期の敵空母発見が最優先

特に追加の行動は不要。現在の索敵態勢を継続する。",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 17), outbound toward (11, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (24, 19), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "両航空隊は引き続き異なる方向に索敵中。現状分析:
1. BSQ1は(11, 11)、BSQ2は(15, 5)方向へ飛行継続
2. まだ敵空母の位置は不明
3. 索敵範囲を広げることで、敵空母発見の可能性を維持

戦略的考察:
- 現在の飛行経路を維持
- 空母BC1は静止し、航空隊の索敵結果を待機
- 敵空母の早期発見が最重要課題

追加の行動は不要。現在の索敵態勢を継続する。",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (19, 20) while at (18, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (19, 20) (previously at (16, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 16), outbound toward (11, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 15), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "重要な展開！BSQ1が敵航空隊(ASQ1)を発見。これは敵空母接近の可能性を示唆している。

現状分析:
1. 敵航空隊ASQ1は(19, 20)に位置
2. 敵空母の正確な位置はまだ不明
3. ASQ1の移動から、敵空母が近くにいる可能性が高い

即時戦略:
- BSQ1は現在の位置から敵航空隊の近くにいるため、索敵を継続
- BSQ2は(15, 5)方向への索敵を中止し、ASQ1付近に方向転換
- 敵空母の位置特定と攻撃準備を最優先

具体的行動:
- BSQ2の発艦目標を(19, 20)付近に変更し、敵航空隊周辺を索敵",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": {"x": 19, "y": 20}
    }
}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{
    "thinking": "重要な展開！BSQ1が敵航空隊(ASQ1)を発見。これは敵空母接近の可能性を示唆している。

現状分析:
1. 敵航空隊ASQ1は(19, 20)に位置
2. 敵空母の正確な位置はまだ不明
3. ASQ1の移動から、敵空母が近くにいる可能性が高い
4. 現在、全航空隊が既に索敵中で発艦できない状況

即時戦略:
- 現在の両航空隊(BSQ1, BSQ2)の飛行経路を維持
- 敵航空隊の位置情報を注意深く監視
- 次のターンに備えて情報収集を継続

追加の行動は不可能なため、現状の索敵態勢を継続する。",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (19, 20) (previously at (16, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 13), outbound toward (11, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (20, 11), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "敵航空隊ASQ1の位置が依然として不明確。現状分析:
1. BSQ1とBSQ2は異なる方向に索敵中
2. 敵空母の位置は特定できていない
3. ASQ1は前回(19, 20)で確認されたが、現在の正確な位置は不明

戦略的考察:
- 両航空隊の現在の索敵経路を維持
- 敵空母と敵航空隊の位置を特定することが最重要
- 広範囲の索敵を継続し、情報収集に努める

現時点では追加の行動は不要。現在の索敵態勢を継続する。",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (25, 23) while at (27, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 9) while at (13, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (25, 23) (previously at (16, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 10), outbound toward (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 7), outbound toward (15, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "重大な展開！敵空母(AC1)の位置が特定され、同時に敵航空隊(ASQ1)も我が空母の近くで発見された。

現状分析:
1. 敵空母AC1は(11, 9)に位置
2. 敵航空隊ASQ1は(25, 23)で我が空母の索敵範囲内に存在
3. BSQ1は敵空母に向けて飛行中
4. BSQ2は依然として(15, 5)方向に飛行

戦略的判断:
- BSQ1は敵空母に向かっており、攻撃の好機
- ASQ1の位置から、敵空母の防御態勢を注意深く観察する必要がある
- BC1は現在位置で静止し、航空隊の行動を支援

即時行動:
- BSQ1の現在の飛行経路を維持し、敵空母への攻撃準備
- BC1は現在位置に留まり、状況を監視",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (26, 25) while at (27, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 9) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 5).

- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 100/100.

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 10), engaging an enemy target at (11, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 5), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "戦闘が本格化！BSQ1が敵空母(AC1)と交戦中。

現状分析:
1. BSQ1が敵空母(AC1)と直接交戦中
2. 敵航空隊ASQ1は(26, 25)で我が空母の近くに位置
3. BSQ2は帰投中

戦略的判断:
- BSQ1の攻撃を全面的にサポート
- 敵航空隊ASQ1の動向に警戒
- BSQ2は帰投後、次の攻撃に備える

即時行動:
- BC1は現在位置に留まり、BSQ1の攻撃を支援
- BSQ2の帰投を待ち、次の攻撃準備",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (27, 24).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 26 damage while at (27, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 17 damage while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 74/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (26, 25) (previously at (16, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 24), stationary, HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 10), returning to the carrier, HP 23/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{
    "thinking": "戦闘の第一波が終了。重要な攻撃結果が判明。

戦闘状況分析:
1. BC1が敵航空隊ASQ1に26ダメージを与え、大きく無力化
2. BSQ1が敵空母AC1に17ダメージを与え、HP74/100に
3. BSQ1とBSQ2は共に帰投中
4. 我が空母BC1はHP74/100と被害を受けている

戦略的判断:
- 初回攻撃は成功。敵空母と敵航空隊に大きなダメージ
- 両航空隊の帰投を待ち、次の攻撃に備える
- 敵の反撃に警戒し、空母の位置を維持

次のターンの準備:
- BC1は現在位置を維持
- 航空隊の帰投と補給を最優先
- 次の攻撃のタイミングを慎重に計画",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (24, 21) while at (27, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 9) while at (13, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 74/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (24, 21) (previously at (16, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:

{
    "thinking": "戦況が流動的に推移。重要な情報を整理。

戦闘状況分析:
1. 敵空母AC1は依然(11, 9)に位置し、HP74/100
2. 敵航空隊ASQ1は(24, 21)に移動
3. BSQ1とBSQ2は共に帰投中
4. BC1は現在地で静止、HP74/100

戦略的判断:
- 初回攻撃で敵に一定のダメージを与えた
- 両航空隊の帰投を待ち、次の攻撃準備
- 敵の動きを注意深く監視

次のターンの方針:
- BC1は現在位置を維持
- 航空隊の帰投と迅速な再発艦を計画
- 敵空母への追加攻撃のタイミングを慎重に検討",
    "action": {
        "carrier_target": null,
        "launch_target": null
    }
}

Turn 11 of 30.

{
    "thinking": "戦況が複雑化。新たな敵航空隊の位置が明らかに。

戦闘状況分析:
1. 敵空母AC1は(11, 9)に位置、HP74/100
2. 新たな敵航空隊ASQ2が(11, 10)に出現

4. BSQ1とBSQ2は帰投中
5. BC1は現在地で静止、HP74/100

戦略的判断:
- 敵は2つの航空隊で対抗策を講じている
- 我が航空隊の帰投と迅速な再発艦が重要
- 敵空母と航空隊への継続的な攻撃が必要

次のターンの方針:
- BC1は現在位置を維持
- 航空隊の帰投後、迅速に再発艦
- 敵空母と航空隊への攻撃タイミングを慎重に計画",

}
